welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bissegem, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore all that Bissegem has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostend/Bruges International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
